TODOÂ¶

The VGM package is work in progress. The following items have not yet been adressed or require more attention:

  • Change the inline documentation format to Sphinx-Style to produce better autodoc output.
  • Extend VGM modules, e.g. physiology.py to account for species differences, as more data become available.
  • Perform extensive code profiling and rewrite modules in Cython where appropriate.
  • Write an Embedded Pries solver (core region solved using Pries solver, surrounding region solved using Kirchhoff).
